name: CPActionSheetTemplate
desc: A template that displays a modal action sheet.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title of the action sheet.

items.name: var message: String?
items.desc: The descriptive message providing details about the reason for displaying the action sheet.

items.name: var actions: [CPAlertAction]
items.desc: The list of actions available on the action sheet.
